item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a hobbyist from Finland. I’m interested in programming and computers in general. I started coding in Python, and I’ve been coding in C for about 4 years. I like to experiment with different tools, languages, devices, etc.

What stuff I use(little bit TODO):

  • OS: OpenSuse Tumbleweed
  • Terminal: Konsole
  • Editor: VSCode

My PC specs:

  • MOBO: Gigabyte Z490M
  • CPU: Intel Core i7-10700KF
  • RAM: HyperX Predator 16GB DDR4 3200Mhz
  • GPU: Gigabyte Radeon RX 7600
  • Storage: 512TB Intel 660p NVMe SSD, 2TB Toshiba P300 HDD
